lemma ground_aux_simps[simp]:
  "ground_aux zer S = True"
  "ground_aux (Var k) S = (if atom k \<in> S then True else False)"
  "ground_aux (suc t) S = (ground_aux t S)"
  "ground_aux (pls t u) S = (ground_aux t S \<and> ground_aux u S)"
  "ground_aux (tms t u) S = (ground_aux t S \<and> ground_aux u S)"

lemma ground_fmla_aux_simps[simp]:
  "ground_fmla_aux fls S = True"
  "ground_fmla_aux (t EQ u) S = (ground_aux t S \<and> ground_aux u S)"
  "ground_fmla_aux (A OR B) S = (ground_fmla_aux A S \<and> ground_fmla_aux B S)"
  "ground_fmla_aux (A AND B) S = (ground_fmla_aux A S \<and> ground_fmla_aux B S)"
  "ground_fmla_aux (A IFF B) S = (ground_fmla_aux A S \<and> ground_fmla_aux B S)"
  "ground_fmla_aux (neg A) S =  (ground_fmla_aux A S)"
  "ground_fmla_aux (exi x A) S = (ground_fmla_aux A (S \<union> {atom x}))"

lemma ground_fresh[simp]:
  "ground t \<Longrightarrow> atom i \<sharp> t"
  "ground_fmla A \<Longrightarrow> atom i \<sharp> A"

lemma Fvars_trm_simps[simp]:
  "Fvars zer = {}"
  "Fvars (Var a) = {a}"
  "Fvars (suc x ) = Fvars x"
  "Fvars (pls x y) = Fvars x \<union> Fvars y"
  "Fvars (tms x y) = Fvars x \<union> Fvars y"

lemma finite_Fvars_trm[simp]:
  fixes t :: trm
  shows "finite (Fvars t)"

lemma Fvars_fmla_simps[simp]:
  "Fvars (x EQ y) = Fvars x \<union> Fvars y"
  "Fvars (A OR B) = Fvars A \<union> Fvars B"
  "Fvars (A AND B) = Fvars A \<union> Fvars B"
  "Fvars (A IMP B) = Fvars A \<union> Fvars B"
  "Fvars fls = {}"
  "Fvars (neg A) = Fvars A"
  "Fvars (exi a A) = Fvars A - {a}"
  "Fvars (all a A) = Fvars A - {a}"

lemma finite_Fvars_fmla[simp]:
  fixes A :: fmla
  shows "finite (Fvars A)"

lemma subst_trm_subst_trm[simp]:
  "x \<noteq> y \<Longrightarrow> atom x \<sharp> u \<Longrightarrow> subst y u (subst x t v) = subst x (subst y u t) (subst y u v)"

lemma subst_fmla_subst_fmla[simp]:
  "x \<noteq> y \<Longrightarrow> atom x \<sharp> u \<Longrightarrow> (A(x::=t))(y::=u) = (A(y::=u))(x::=subst y u t)"
lemma Fvars_empty_ground[simp]: "Fvars t = {} \<Longrightarrow> ground t"
lemma Fvars_ground_aux: "Fvars t \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow> ground_aux t (atom ` B)"
lemma ground_Fvars: "ground t \<longleftrightarrow> Fvars t = {}"
lemma Fvars_ground_fmla_aux: "Fvars A \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow> ground_fmla_aux A (atom ` B)"
lemma ground_fmla_Fvars: "ground_fmla A \<longleftrightarrow> Fvars A = {}"

lemma obtain_const_trm:
obtains t where "eval_trm e t = x" "t \<in> num"

lemma ex_eval_fmla_iff_exists_num:
  "eval_fmla e (exi k A) \<longleftrightarrow> (\<exists>t. eval_fmla e (A(k::=t)) \<and> t \<in> num)"
lemma exi_ren: "y \<notin> Fvars \<phi> \<Longrightarrow> exi x \<phi> = exi y (\<phi>(x::=Var y))"
lemma all_ren: "y \<notin> Fvars \<phi> \<Longrightarrow> all x \<phi> = all y (\<phi>(x::=Var y))"
lemma Fvars_num[simp]: "t \<in> num \<Longrightarrow> Fvars t = {}"
lemma num_range_Num: "num = range Num"
lemma [simp]: "{} \<turnstile> neg (zer EQ suc (Var xx))"
lemma [simp]: "{} \<turnstile> Var yy EQ zer OR exi xx (Var yy EQ suc (Var xx))"
lemma [simp]: "{} \<turnstile> pls (Var xx) zer EQ Var xx"
lemma [simp]: "{} \<turnstile> tms (Var xx) zer EQ zer"

lemma ground_aux_simps[simp]:
  "ground_aux zer S = True"
  "ground_aux (Var k) S = (if atom k \<in> S then True else False)"
  "ground_aux (suc t) S = (ground_aux t S)"
  "ground_aux (pls t u) S = (ground_aux t S \<and> ground_aux u S)"
  "ground_aux (tms t u) S = (ground_aux t S \<and> ground_aux u S)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (ground_aux zer S = True &&&
     ground_aux (Var k) S = (if atom k \<in> S then True else False)) &&&
    ground_aux (suc t) S = ground_aux t S &&&
    ground_aux (pls t u) S = (ground_aux t S \<and> ground_aux u S) &&&
    ground_aux (tms t u) S = (ground_aux t S \<and> ground_aux u S)
unfolding ground_aux_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((supp zer \<subseteq> S) = True &&&
     (supp (Var k) \<subseteq> S) =
     (if atom k \<in> S then True else False)) &&&
    (supp (suc t) \<subseteq> S) = (supp t \<subseteq> S) &&&
    (supp (pls t u) \<subseteq> S) =
    (supp t \<subseteq> S \<and> supp u \<subseteq> S) &&&
    (supp (tms t u) \<subseteq> S) =
    (supp t \<subseteq> S \<and> supp u \<subseteq> S)
by (simp_all add: supp_at_base)

lemma ground_fmla_aux_simps[simp]:
  "ground_fmla_aux fls S = True"
  "ground_fmla_aux (t EQ u) S = (ground_aux t S \<and> ground_aux u S)"
  "ground_fmla_aux (A OR B) S = (ground_fmla_aux A S \<and> ground_fmla_aux B S)"
  "ground_fmla_aux (A AND B) S = (ground_fmla_aux A S \<and> ground_fmla_aux B S)"
  "ground_fmla_aux (A IFF B) S = (ground_fmla_aux A S \<and> ground_fmla_aux B S)"
  "ground_fmla_aux (neg A) S =  (ground_fmla_aux A S)"
  "ground_fmla_aux (exi x A) S = (ground_fmla_aux A (S \<union> {atom x}))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (ground_fmla_aux fls S = True &&&
     ground_fmla_aux (t EQ u) S = (ground_aux t S \<and> ground_aux u S) &&&
     ground_fmla_aux (A OR B) S =
     (ground_fmla_aux A S \<and> ground_fmla_aux B S)) &&&
    (ground_fmla_aux (A AND B) S =
     (ground_fmla_aux A S \<and> ground_fmla_aux B S) &&&
     ground_fmla_aux (A IFF B) S =
     (ground_fmla_aux A S \<and> ground_fmla_aux B S)) &&&
    ground_fmla_aux (neg A) S = ground_fmla_aux A S &&&
    ground_fmla_aux (exi x A) S = ground_fmla_aux A (S \<union> {atom x})
by (auto simp: ground_fmla_aux_def ground_aux_def supp_conv_fresh)

lemma ground_fresh[simp]:
  "ground t \<Longrightarrow> atom i \<sharp> t"
  "ground_fmla A \<Longrightarrow> atom i \<sharp> A"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (ground t \<Longrightarrow> atom i \<sharp> t) &&&
    (ground_fmla A \<Longrightarrow> atom i \<sharp> A)
unfolding ground_aux_def ground_fmla_aux_def fresh_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (supp t \<subseteq> {} \<Longrightarrow> atom i \<notin> supp t) &&&
    (supp A \<subseteq> {} \<Longrightarrow> atom i \<notin> supp A)
by simp_all
(* This applies to all nominal types, including terms and formulas: *)
definition "Fvars t = {a :: name. \<not> atom a \<sharp> t}"

lemma Fvars_trm_simps[simp]:
  "Fvars zer = {}"
  "Fvars (Var a) = {a}"
  "Fvars (suc x ) = Fvars x"
  "Fvars (pls x y) = Fvars x \<union> Fvars y"
  "Fvars (tms x y) = Fvars x \<union> Fvars y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (Fvars zer = {} &&& Fvars (Var a) = {a}) &&&
    Fvars (suc x) = Fvars x &&&
    Fvars (pls x y) = Fvars x \<union> Fvars y &&&
    Fvars (tms x y) = Fvars x \<union> Fvars y
by (auto simp: Fvars_def fresh_at_base(2))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):

by (induct t rule: trm.induct) auto

lemma Fvars_fmla_simps[simp]:
  "Fvars (x EQ y) = Fvars x \<union> Fvars y"
  "Fvars (A OR B) = Fvars A \<union> Fvars B"
  "Fvars (A AND B) = Fvars A \<union> Fvars B"
  "Fvars (A IMP B) = Fvars A \<union> Fvars B"
  "Fvars fls = {}"
  "Fvars (neg A) = Fvars A"
  "Fvars (exi a A) = Fvars A - {a}"
  "Fvars (all a A) = Fvars A - {a}"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((Fvars (x EQ y) = Fvars x \<union> Fvars y &&&
      Fvars (A OR B) = Fvars A \<union> Fvars B) &&&
     Fvars (A AND B) = Fvars A \<union> Fvars B &&&
     Fvars (A IMP B) = Fvars A \<union> Fvars B) &&&
    (Fvars fls = {} &&& Fvars (neg A) = Fvars A) &&&
    Fvars (exi a A) = Fvars A - {a} &&& Fvars (all a A) = Fvars A - {a}
by (auto simp: Fvars_def fresh_at_base(2))

lemma Fvars_ground_fmla_aux: "Fvars A \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow> ground_fmla_aux A (atom ` B)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Fvars A \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow> ground_fmla_aux A (atom ` B)
apply (induct A arbitrary: B rule: fmla.induct)

proof (prove)
goal (4 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x1 x2 B.
       Fvars (x1 EQ x2) \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow>
       ground_fmla_aux (x1 EQ x2) (atom ` B)
 2. \<And>x1 x2 B.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>B.
                   Fvars x1 \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow>
                   ground_fmla_aux x1 (atom ` B);
        \<And>B.
           Fvars x2 \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow>
           ground_fmla_aux x2 (atom ` B);
        Fvars (x1 OR x2) \<subseteq> B\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ground_fmla_aux (x1 OR x2) (atom ` B)
 3. \<And>x B.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>B.
                   Fvars x \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow>
                   ground_fmla_aux x (atom ` B);
        Fvars (neg x) \<subseteq> B\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ground_fmla_aux (neg x) (atom ` B)
 4. \<And>x1 x2 B.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>B.
                   Fvars x2 \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow>
                   ground_fmla_aux x2 (atom ` B);
        Fvars (exi x1 x2) \<subseteq> B\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ground_fmla_aux (exi x1 x2) (atom ` B)
subgoal

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Fvars (x1_ EQ x2_) \<subseteq> B_ \<Longrightarrow>
    ground_fmla_aux (x1_ EQ x2_) (atom ` B_)
by (auto simp: Diff_subset_conv Fvars_ground_aux)

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x1 x2 B.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>B.
                   Fvars x1 \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow>
                   ground_fmla_aux x1 (atom ` B);
        \<And>B.
           Fvars x2 \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow>
           ground_fmla_aux x2 (atom ` B);
        Fvars (x1 OR x2) \<subseteq> B\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ground_fmla_aux (x1 OR x2) (atom ` B)
 2. \<And>x B.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>B.
                   Fvars x \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow>
                   ground_fmla_aux x (atom ` B);
        Fvars (neg x) \<subseteq> B\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ground_fmla_aux (neg x) (atom ` B)
 3. \<And>x1 x2 B.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>B.
                   Fvars x2 \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow>
                   ground_fmla_aux x2 (atom ` B);
        Fvars (exi x1 x2) \<subseteq> B\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ground_fmla_aux (exi x1 x2) (atom ` B)
subgoal

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<And>B.
                Fvars x1_ \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow>
                ground_fmla_aux x1_ (atom ` B);
     \<And>B.
        Fvars x2_ \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow>
        ground_fmla_aux x2_ (atom ` B);
     Fvars (x1_ OR x2_) \<subseteq> B_\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> ground_fmla_aux (x1_ OR x2_) (atom ` B_)
by (auto simp: Diff_subset_conv Fvars_ground_aux)

proof (prove)

       \<lbrakk>\<And>B.
                   Fvars x \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow>
                   ground_fmla_aux x (atom ` B);

 2. \<And>x1 x2 B.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>B.
                   Fvars x2 \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow>
                   ground_fmla_aux x2 (atom ` B);
        Fvars (exi x1 x2) \<subseteq> B\<rbrakk>

goal (1 subgoal):

     Fvars (neg x_) \<subseteq> B_\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> ground_fmla_aux (neg x_) (atom ` B_)

lemma obtain_const_trm:
obtains t where "eval_trm e t = x" "t \<in> num"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>t.
        \<lbrakk>eval_trm e t = x; t \<in> num\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
apply (induct x)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. (\<And>t.
        \<lbrakk>eval_trm e t = 0; t \<in> num\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
 2. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>(\<And>t.
                    \<lbrakk>eval_trm e t = x; t \<in> num\<rbrakk>
                    \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
                thesis;
        \<And>t.
           \<lbrakk>eval_trm e t = Suc x; t \<in> num\<rbrakk>
           \<Longrightarrow> thesis\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> thesis
using eval_trm.simps(1) eval_trm.simps(3) num.suc

proof (prove)
using this:
  eval_trm ?e zer = 0
  eval_trm ?e (suc ?t) = Suc (eval_trm ?e ?t)
  ?t \<in> num \<Longrightarrow> suc ?t \<in> num

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. (\<And>t.
        \<lbrakk>eval_trm e t = 0; t \<in> num\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
 2. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>(\<And>t.
                    \<lbrakk>eval_trm e t = x; t \<in> num\<rbrakk>
                    \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
                thesis;
        \<And>t.
           \<lbrakk>eval_trm e t = Suc x; t \<in> num\<rbrakk>
           \<Longrightarrow> thesis\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> thesis
by blast+

proof (prove)

using exi_ren_subst_fresh Fvars_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  atom ?y \<sharp> ?\<phi> \<Longrightarrow>
  exi ?x ?\<phi> = exi ?y (?\<phi>(?x::=Var ?y))
  Fvars ?t = {a. \<not> atom a \<sharp> ?t}

goal (1 subgoal):

    exi x \<phi> = exi y (\<phi>(x::=Var y))
by blast

subsection \<open>Instantiation of the generic syntax and deduction relation\<close>

interpretation Generic_Syntax where
      var = "UNIV :: name set"
  and trm = "UNIV :: trm set"
  and fmla = "UNIV :: fmla set"
  and Var = Var
  and FvarsT = Fvars
  and substT = "\<lambda>t u x. subst x u t"
  and Fvars = Fvars
  and subst = "\<lambda>A u x. subst_fmla A x u"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Generic_Syntax UNIV UNIV UNIV Var Fvars (\<lambda>t u x. subst x u t)
     Fvars (\<lambda>A u x. A(x::=u))
apply unfold_locales

proof (prove)
goal (17 subgoals):
 1. infinite UNIV
 2. \<And>x. x \<in> UNIV \<Longrightarrow> Var x \<in> UNIV
 3. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>x \<in> UNIV; y \<in> UNIV\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (Var x = Var y) = (x = y)
 4. \<And>t. t \<in> UNIV \<Longrightarrow> finite (Fvars t)
 5. \<And>t. t \<in> UNIV \<Longrightarrow> Fvars t \<subseteq> UNIV
 6. \<And>t1 t x.
       \<lbrakk>t1 \<in> UNIV; t \<in> UNIV; x \<in> UNIV\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> subst x t t1 \<in> UNIV
 7. \<And>x. x \<in> UNIV \<Longrightarrow> Fvars (Var x) = {x}
 8. \<And>x t y.
       \<lbrakk>x \<in> UNIV; y \<in> UNIV; t \<in> UNIV\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> subst y t (Var x) = (if x = y then t else Var x)
 9. \<And>t1 t2 x.
       \<lbrakk>x \<in> UNIV; t1 \<in> UNIV; t2 \<in> UNIV;
        x \<notin> Fvars t1\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> subst x t2 t1 = t1
 10. \<And>\<phi>. \<phi> \<in> UNIV \<Longrightarrow> finite (Fvars \<phi>)
A total of 17 subgoals...

proof (prove)
goal (16 subgoals):

 2. \<And>x y.
